casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Robert Wayne STANLEY 376P02-6 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 8, 2017 Teresa M. Postell, Assistant Attorney General, James R. O'Neill, District Attorney, for State of NC. Ann B. Petersen, Attorney at Law, Chapel Hill, for Stanley, Robert Wayne. The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 10th of March 2017 by Defendant to Dismiss the Petition for Discretionary Review: "Motion Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 8th of June 2017." Ervin, J. recused
